name: Federal only - Low income (CAD 30,000)
description: Federal taxes only, low income. CPP on earnings from $3,500 to $30,000 = $26,500 * 5.95% = $1,576.75. EI = $30,000 * 1.63% = $489. Federal tax = bracket_tax(30000) = 30000 * 14% = $4,200. BPA credit = $16,452 * 14% = $2,303.28. Employment credit = $1,500 * 14% = $210. Tax after credits = max(0, 4200 - 2513.28) = $1,686.72.
